title: Extreme Clutter
overview: In each episode, organization expert Peter Walsh helps people whose lives have been dramatically affected by the overwhelming presence of clutter. Using his step-by-step process, Walsh guides families through the emotional journey of overcoming their attachment to material items. He pinpoints the root of their problem, and provides them with practical tools to live a clutter-free life. In season two, Walsh takes a look at specific themes associated with disorganization and clutter including: overcoming the temptation to shop for good deals, clutter related to broken relationships, the impact clutter has on families and kids, and how to move forward and let go of items after the loss of a loved one.
